meanings.definition: An aspect of 60 degrees between two planets in an astrological chart.
meanings.sent1: In astrology, a sextile is when two planets are 60 degrees apart.
meanings.sent2: The sextile between Mars and Venus indicates harmony and cooperation.
meanings.sent3: During the celestial meeting, the sextile between Jupiter and Saturn sparked cosmic joy.
meanings.sent4: The sextile of Mercury and Neptune whispered secrets across the universe.
meanings.sent5: The sextile alignment of the planets painted a beautiful cosmic picture in the sky.

meanings.definition: A geometric figure with six sides and six angles.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about the sextile shape in geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had a colorful sextile drawn on the pavement.
meanings.sent3: The sextile puzzle piece fit perfectly into the pattern, completing the design.
meanings.sent4: The sextile garden bed was filled with vibrant flowers blooming in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The sextile on the map marked the location of the hidden treasure.
